title: Puzzle Audio Solution
description: Puzzle Audio Solution contains 85 high quality files including music loops and original sound effects ideal for puzzle videogames: match 3 (jewels matching), logic, physics puzzle, escape room, test, etc.
longDescription:
Preview FULL MIX: soundcloud.com/plasticsounddesign/puzzle-audio-solution-full-mix

MUSIC: soundcloud.com/plasticsounddesign/sets/puzzle-audio-solution-preview


Puzzle Audio Solution contains 85 high quality files including music loops and original sound effects ideal for puzzle videogames: match 3 (jewels matching), logic, physics puzzle, escape room, test, etc.


The main music loop tracks included are:

- Put the Pieces Together 1:28

- Hurry up! 1:32

- Keep Calm and Be LogicalÂ 1:32

- Zen Puzzle 2:00

- Step by Step 1:20

- A Mystery to Solve 2:02


73 original SFX files: clicks, hits, explosions, metal & wood sounds, treasure found, clock, voices, win & lose, chiptune, whoosh, events, etc.


All tracks are perfectly seamless wave files at 44 KHz, 16 Bit and Stereo.

Please, let us know where you use any of these songs. We'll be glad to put a reference of your project in our social and web.
technicalDetails:
All music tracks are seamless looping wave files

Number of Audio Wavs: 85

Number of Audio Cues: 85

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Minutes of audio provided: 21 min.

How many sound FX: 73

Intended Platform: All
